page.title: 11RELIGION IN ALTRINCHAM
page.content: WE FOUND FROM CONDUCTING A SURVEY THAT THE POPULATION OF THE AREA WAS MOSTLY WHITE, HAVING FEW FAITHS APART FROM { {CHRISTIAN.}THERE WERE THREE MAIN DENOMINATIONS,{ANGLICANS,ROMAN {CATHOLICS}AND {METHODISTS.} FROM THE PEOPLE INTERVIEWED, THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION WAS GATHERED: A) MOST PEOPLE THOUGHT THAT RELIGION WAS IMPORTANT TO DAILY LIFE. B) MOST PEOPLE ATTEND CHURCH AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH. C) ABOUT 50% TAKE PART IN CHURCH ORGANISED ACTIVITIES. D) ONLY 5% OVERALL EXPRESSED NO INTEREST AT ALL TO RELIGION.
